snippet.title: Isle of Arrows Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1946970/Isle_of_Arrows/

Isle of Arrows is a fusion of tower defense and board game, in which you place randomly drawn tiles to build defenses on an ever-growing piece of land.

Website: https://gridpop.co/isle
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gridpopgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gridpopgames/
